fields.name: AuthenticationType
fields.description: Specifies the authentication type being used for connecting to the endpoint. Defaults to 'KeyBased'. If 'KeyBased' is selected, a connection string must be specified (at least the primary connection string). If 'IdentityBased' is select, the endpointUri and entityPath properties must be specified.

fields.name: CreatedTime
fields.description: Time when the Endpoint was added to DigitalTwinsInstance.

fields.name: DeadLetterSecret
fields.description: Dead letter storage secret for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

fields.name: DeadLetterUri
fields.description: Dead letter storage URL for identity-based authentication.

fields.name: EndpointType
fields.description: The type of Digital Twins endpoint

fields.name: Identity
fields.description: Managed identity properties for the endpoint.
